|brand = EnGenius |model = ECB3500 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 10/28/2010 |page_start_origon = https://infodepot.fandom.com/wiki/EnGenius_ECB-3500 |wlclass = G54 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = access point, bridge, repeater |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = U2M-CB36600801 |icid = 3616C-CB366081 |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = 7016A0158070 |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Atheros;AR2316A; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 4KEc |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 180 <!-- 180 MHz --><!-- 180 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = STMicro;25P64V6P; |flash1size = 8 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 32 |ram1chip = EtronTech;EM63A165TS-6G; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Realtek;RTL8201CP; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = IEEE 802.3/3u |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:02:6F |oui = 00:02:6F
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = RedBoot;1.1;; |stockos = Linux;2.4.25;LSDK-5.3.1.46;
|exp_if_types = <!-- Expansion Interface types, Leave blank for none -->

|serial = yes,, 6-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->

|defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = Engenius1 |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Senao |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = DD-WRT

}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "ECB-3660-1.10 LFP" and "7016A0158070" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
The default SSID may be '''EnGenius'''.
==Links of Interest== [http://www.engeniustech.com/resources/ECB3500-UsersManual-V1-4_20090518.pdf Manual]
